naslov: PRODAJE SE – Izvorna dalmatinska kuća, Vis – Gornje Kunjanovo (prodaja)
opis: U mirnom i autentičnom selu Gornje Kunjanovo na otoku Visu prodaje se tradicionalna kamena kuća s velikim potencijalom. Ukupna korisna površina kuće iznosi 100,91 m² raspoređenih na tri etaže (suteren, prizemlje i potkrovlje), dok okućnica s tlocrtom kuće zauzima ukupno 206 m² (od čega cca 160 m² pripada vanjskom prostoru). Nekretnina je legalna s uporabnom dozvolom za objekt izgrađen prije 1968. godine, a vlasništvo je 1/1, bez tereta. Kuća zahtijeva adaptaciju, no odlikuje se izvrsno očuvanom kamenom strukturom, drvenim međukatnim gredama i originalnim detaljima koji pružaju lijep temelj za obnovu u stilu mediteranske rustike. Dvorište je nenametljivo i obogaćeno starom krušnom peći, idealnom za prenamjenu u vanjsku kuhinju ili opuštajuću terasu. ✅ Ključne značajke: - Infrastruktura (voda i struja) je dostupna, a priključenje se može službeno zatražiti - Pristup vozilom - Otvoren pogled na polje i zelenilo - Zračna udaljenost od mora: cca 1-2 km (blizina uvala: Stiniva, Taleška, Smričevica, Trovna) - Udaljenost od Vis-a / Komiže 15 min vožnjom automobilom - Video obilazak: https://youtu.be/enaOw1G2XHQ ✅ Idealna za: - Kuću za odmor - Vikendicu u prirodi - Retreat za kreativce i digitalne nomade - Boutique turistički projekt ✅ Kontakt: Nazovite za informacije i dogovor o razgledavanju, 091/2381823 (kontakt osoba: Domagoj Udiljak, SQM.ONE – licencirani posrednik u prometu nekretnina) ℹ️ Napomena: Agencijska provizija za kupca iznosi 3% od kupoprodajne cijene i uključuje kompletnu koordinaciju kupoprodajnog procesa. -------------------------------------------------------------- FOR SALE – Traditional Dalmatian Stone House, Vis – Gornje Kunjanovo Located in the peaceful and authentic village of Gornje Kunjanovo on the island of Vis, this traditional stone house offers great potential. The total usable interior area is 100.91 m², spread across three levels (cellar, ground floor, and attic), while the house and yard occupy 206 m² in total (approx. 160 m² of exterior space). The property has a valid certificate of occupancy for a building constructed prior to 1968. It is registered to a single owner (1/1) and holds a clear, unencumbered title. The house requires renovation, but boasts a well-preserved stone structure, original wooden floor beams, and architectural details that provide a solid foundation for restoration in Mediterranean rustic style. The courtyard is discreet, featuring an old stone bread oven that can be beautifully converted into an outdoor kitchen or relaxing terrace. ✅ Key Features: - Water and electricity infrastructure is available; official connection can be requested - Vehicle access to the property - Open views of the nearby fields and greenery - Approx. 1–2 km from the sea (close to the bays of Stiniva, Taleška, Smričevica, and Trovna) - 15-minute drive to the towns of Vis or Komiža - Video tour: https://youtu.be/enaOw1G2XHQ ✅ Ideal for: - Vacation home - Countryside weekend retreat - Creative or digital nomad escape - Boutique tourism project ✅ Contact: For more information or to schedule a viewing, call: +385 91 238 1823 (Contact person: Domagoj Udiljak, SQM.ONE – licensed real estate agent) ℹ️ Note: The buyer is subject to an agency commission of 3% of the purchase price, which includes full coordination of the sales process.
